summary: My goal is to best protect and grow the wealth of individuals by developing customized investment plans, free from bias, and to provide clients with the utmost in transparency, communication, and financial plan oversight.My firm provides fee-based investment management. My process involves discovering my clients’ goals, risk tolerance, and investment time horizon; building an asset allocation plan to meet those specifics; implementing that plan; and continuing to monitor that plan and communicate with clients to make adjustments to best suit their needs. Additionally, I help clients allocate their employer retirement plans, and offer complementary consultation regarding tax, insurance, and estate planning in regards to financial planning.Specialties: • Asset Allocation• Investments• Risk Management • Tax Reduction• Education Planning (529 Plans)• Retirement Planning (401k, IRA, Roth)• Investment Performance Reviews• Fiduciary Guidance
